subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist made 41 saves, and Ryan Callahan, Marian Gaborik and Chris Drury scored second-period goals as the Rangers beat the Devils at the Garden.
snippet: Henrik Lundqvist made 41 saves, and Ryan Callahan, Marian Gaborik and Chris Drury scored second-period goals as the Rangers beat the Devils at the Garden.
